Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Descriptino: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: AllLanguages
Title: All Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes all possible codes from BCP-47 (see http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: Iso3166-1-2
Title: Iso 3166 Part 1: 2 Letter Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines the ISO 3166 Part 1 2-letter codes

Name: Iso3166-1-3
Title: Iso 3166 Part 1: 3 Letter Codes
Descriptino: This value set defines the ISO 3166 Part 1 3-letter codes

Name: AbsentOrUnknownImmunizationUvIps
Title: Absent or Unknown Immunization - IPS
Descriptino: Absent or Unknown Immunization

Name: MedicineRouteOfAdministrationUvIps
Title: Medicine Route of Administration - IPS
Descriptino: EDQM (European Directorate for the Quality of Medicines and Healthcare) Route of Administration codes.  This Value Set includes all the EDQM Standard Terms having:   [Concept Status] = ‘Current’ AND   [Concept Class] = 'ROA' AND   [Domain] = 'Human and Veterinary'    ROA = 'Route of administration'

Name: PersonalRelationshipUvIps
Title: Personal Relationship - IPS [Deprecated]
Descriptino: The Value Set is used (optionally) to code the type of contact relationship between a person and the patient. This value set has been deprecated and will be removed in a future release.  It has been replaced with [PersonalRelationshipRoleType](https://terminology.hl7.org/3.1.0/ValueSet-v3-PersonalRelationshipRoleType.html)

Name: TargetSiteUvIps
Title: Target Site - IPS
Descriptino: This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: all descendants of 442083009 | Anatomical or acquired body structure (body structure)|.

Name: VaccineTargetDiseasesUvIpsDeprecated
Title: Vaccine Target Diseases - IPS [Deprecated]
Descriptino: This value set includes the codes from SNOMED CT describing Vaccine Target Diseases. To follow a consistent value set naming pattern, this value set has been deprecated and will be removed in a future release.  It has been replaced with [target-diseases-uv-ips](./ValueSet-target-diseases-uv-ips.html)

Name: VaccinesUvIps
Title: Vaccines - IPS
Descriptino: This value set provides a list of types of vaccine, plus IPS codes for absent/unknown immunizations. It includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: all descendants of 787859002 \|Vaccine product (product)\|.

Name: WhoAtcUvIps
Title: WHO ATC - IPS
Descriptino: World Health Organization Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) classification system.  Note: The currently implemented code system and the value set expansion contain only a set of example ATC codes, not the complete code system content.

Name: DDCC_Composition_Category_ValueSet
Title: DDCC Composition Category Codes
Descriptino: Categorization of DDCC Composition

Name: DDCC_Device_Property_ValueSet
Title: DDCC Device Property Codes
Descriptino: Properties of DDCC devices

Name: DDCC_Folder_DesignationType_ValueSet
Title: DDCC DesignationTypes for Folder
Descriptino: DDCC Designation Types ValueSet for DDCC Folders.

Name: DDCC_QR_Format_ValueSet
Title: DDCC QR Format Codes
Descriptino: Format of the representation of QR code

Name: DDCC_QR_Type_ValueSet
Title: DDCC QR Type Codes
Descriptino: Type of QR codes by their business usage

Name: DIVOC_ValueSet
Title: COVID-19 Vaccine Codes for DIVOC
Descriptino: COVID-19 Vaccine codes for DIVOC so the FHIR server can perform expansions.

Name: ICAOV1_ValueSet
Title: DDCC Codes for ICAO Vaccines
Descriptino: ICAO vaccines codes for DDCC so the FHIR server can perform expansions.

Name: LabTestPathogenCovid19SnomedValueSet
Title: Lab Test - Pathogen - COVID-19 - SNOMED CT
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for pathogens in EUDCC, retrieved in February 2023 from https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=uriserv%3AOJ.L_.2021.230.01.0032.01.ENG. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation.

Name: LabTestPathogenDivocValueSet
Title: Lab Test - Pathogen - DIVOC
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for pathogens, retrieved in February 2023. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation. Some information on DIVOC's test certificate can be found at https://github.com/egovernments/DIVOC/blob/main/test-certificate-context/test-certificate-context.js. Additional information on DIVOC can be found at <https://divoc.digit.org/platform/divocs-verifiable-certificate-features>

Name: LabTestQualitativeResultDivocValueSet
Title: Lab Test - Qualitative Result - DIVOC
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed values for lab test results, retrieved in February 2023. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation. Some information on DIVOC's test certificate can be found at https://github.com/egovernments/DIVOC/blob/main/test-certificate-context/test-certificate-context.js. Additional information on DIVOC can be found at <https://divoc.digit.org/platform/divocs-verifiable-certificate-features>

Name: LabTestResultIcaoValueSet

Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential's documentation.

Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the original documentation.

Name: LabTestSampleOriginDivocValueSet

Name: VaccineCovid19CvxValueSet
Title: Vaccine - COVID-19 - CVX
Descriptino: This is a one-time snapshot of the allowed CVX codes for vaccines, retrieved in February 2023. Contents may need to be updated and readers should consult the credential documentation, found here http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/shc-vaccination/2021Sep/ValueSet-vaccine-cvx.html. More information on the CVX value set can be found here, <https://www2a.cdc.gov/vaccines/iis/iisstandards/vaccines.asp?rpt=cvx>

Name: VaccineCovid19EUUnionRegisterValueSet
Title: Vaccine - COVID-19 - EU Union Register of Medicinial Products
Descriptino: Union Register of medicinal products for vaccines with EU-wide authorisation. The Union Register is found at <https://ec.europa.eu/health/documents/community-register/html/index_en.htm>. However, the contents of this ValueSet are based on v1.14 (2023-01-25) of the [EU DCC value set guidelines](https://health.ec.europa.eu/system/files/2023-01/eu-dcc-value-sets_en.pdf).
